titleStmt.title: William T. Coggeshall to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2995

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p:
State Library,
COLUMBUS, OHIO,
October 5, 1861
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky
Sir:
I send you per mail to=day, for Kentucky State Library:
Swan & Critchfield's Statutes 2 vols=Ohio State Reports vols 10 & 11=Ohio Laws, Senate & House Journals. 1861 -- Executive Documents 1860. 2 vols=Ohio Statistics 1860 & Library Report 1860 --

Please acknowledge, and oblige,
Respectfully,
Wm T. Coggeshall.
Librarian.
